website_summaries.verdict: Quality steel meat injector kit with some extras. Definitely worth a little extra money for a kit that will last.
pros: Includes three needles, a spare set of gaskets, and an e-book with recipes and instructions
Easy to use with all types of meat
cons: Some buyers said they had trouble using minced marinades, even with the larger gauge needle, and had to strain first

customer_reviews.title: ... bought this set as a birthday present and rhey loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set as a birthday present and rhey loved it!! They loved that it came with 3easy to change needles for different types of marinades..they especially love the 3 hole needle because unlike other products this actually allows all the chuncky seasonings to get through,with other products they usually get stuck but with this product it didnt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Turkey Injector.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Turkey Injector. I was able to inject Melted butter into my cooking turkey's Breast. It tasted amazing! This is a Stainless Steel Injector, High quality Chef Kitchen Type Injector. Easy to clean Too!
customer_reviews.author: Southern Transplant

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!! NO RECIPE GUIDE THOUGH
customer_reviews.text: This unit is very good. It is very sturdy and will not give way to thicker marinades. This is a professional piece of equipment. The only issue that I have is that they include a recipe guide with the unit. The only problem is that you have to register for it on their website. They tell you that they will confirm your registration and then send you a link to the recipe guide. No email ever comes. I tried it several times with multiple emails. No go (not in Spam either).
customer_reviews.author: Eric Ludwig

customer_reviews.title: Cool Tool
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful tool! My son and I used this tool over the weekend to inject some porkloin roast. The card that comes with it, has easy to follow directions.It cleaned up nicely. Hopefully, it holds up long term, but for now, we are thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn M. O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: The different styles of injectors are wonderful, and the injector itself is of good quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my husband. He loves it. The different styles of injectors are wonderful, and the injector itself is of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Leann Fuller

customer_reviews.text: My marinade injector kit arrived quickly and appears to be of high quality. I want to thank you for the operating instructions and hints for the first time use, they were very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Ron S.

customer_reviews.title: Works great - but strain your marinade first!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, well made. I wish it a had larger opening going into the needle as it clogs with spices easily. I have to strain my marinade before loading the injector. Otherwise a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Walter A. Busch

customer_reviews.title: This is BY FAR the best injector I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. I smoke briskets, pork, almost anything. This is BY FAR the best injector I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: james e gumtow

customer_reviews.title: Very please with results
customer_reviews.text: Held vacuum pressure well when injecting large cut of dense meat. Would recommend to anyone that uses a smoker or slow cooker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy and hygienic
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty. It made work for our butcher easy and hygienic. He ordered 5 sets !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inject flavor throughout your meats!
customer_reviews.text: Well-made injector with three needles. I'm glad to discard the broken,unreliable plastic injectors. Had the best chicken breast ever using this injector and can't wait to use it on all my meats!
customer_reviews.author: William Turner

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and clean. Be careful with the smallest needle as it will bend if not careful.
customer_reviews.author: Philip A. Patel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used yet but it looks like everything we could want in an injector.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Staving

customer_reviews.title: Professional Grade
customer_reviews.text: Just Injected my first Boston Butt, Real easy to use and am looking forward to the results.
customer_reviews.author: John Loveall

customer_reviews.title: Will last a Lifetime
customer_reviews.text: We love this injector. We have purchased MANY others and have thrown them in the garbage because they break so easily. This injector is made to last a life time. Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: barbara a young

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This injector worked great and was easy to clean. I also like the tray to keep it in so the tips don't get bent and it stays together.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Brunk

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen tool
customer_reviews.text: Great kitchen tool to get marinade deep into the meat. Still "playing" with it, but used it a couple of times now and really pleased with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Mick Jones

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: We received the product on time. It was used on the Thanksgiving turkey for the first time. The extra needles help make this injector superior to others. Great quality. The hefty stainless steel syringe wowed our friends!

customer_reviews.title: ... injector with the different needles and it cleans up like no
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this injector with the different needles and it cleans up like no other

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to clean, first time using an injected marinade and it worked! Loved the juicy Thanksgiving Turkey!

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Used a few days after receiving and did not disappoint me. The 3 different needles it came with makes it very versatile with any meat and thickness of marinade. I would definitely recommend this product.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use, clean and store. I love it.

customer_reviews.title: Chicken Filled Up
customer_reviews.text: Sorry to take so long but Jst did A Batch of chicken today an it worked Great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great quality. A very good product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, great quality. A very good product, I am very happy with it.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Storage Case
customer_reviews.text: Terrible storage case. Made of paper. How does one store the syringe and sharp needles after the case falls apart? Very disappointed with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have used other ones but this is the best one yet, does everything they claim. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sturdy but the site pictures are wrong about the smallest tip
customer_reviews.text: The smallest needle is NOT like what is in the pictures, so don't expect to be able to change tips Otherwise Very heavy and solid feeling. Very smooth nice threading. slides very easily Only complaint is about the smallest tip which is not interchangeable like in ALL THE PICTURES and even the pictures on the product box.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Visniewski

customer_reviews.title: ... or never worked at all this is a very nice setup and the three different needles will make it ...
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a few different kinds of injectors and all of them plug up or never worked at all this is a very nice setup and the three different needles will make it easy to use what we like to inject the meat with NO plugging up !!!
customer_reviews.author: DLG

customer_reviews.title: Received my new injector kit and was amazed at the quality
customer_reviews.text: Received my new injector kit and was amazed at the quality. I used it for injecting some Canadian Bacon. Before I started injecting, I cleaned the unit by washing with soap and water then put it in a pan of very hot water. (not the plunger). I let it cool and lube the seal with oil. I injected the bacon with the brine it worked GREAT!!!. Thanks for a great tool. PS: I didn't get the recipe eguide Please send. Thanks Again Rudy Holmes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Need an injector...This is it !!
customer_reviews.text: Really fast shipping, great price .An awesome seller with a high quality product. I've been searching around for an item like this at a great price and I found it here. 3 different injector needles instead of 1 or 2 like many sets have. Very well constructed!
customer_reviews.author: tommyh

customer_reviews.title: Best Marinade Injector We've Used - High Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: We've used a few other syringes and injectors before (including large medical syringes) for injecting turkeys for the fryer, but this injector is hands down the best we've used. It's heavy duty and appears to be well-machined. Love the three types of injection needles. Great product, fair price, fast shipping. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Jolly Roger

customer_reviews.title: blah
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Bought the expensive one, but the others would have been just as good. Holes are too small to get anything but liquid into the food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: having the option of 3 sizes of injector needles is fantastic. the injector is sturdy and very well made
customer_reviews.text: My husband absolutely loves this injector set.He says,having the option of 3 sizes of injector needles is fantastic. the injector is sturdy and very well made. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: STEPHANIE D.

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: The ultimate tool to produce the best meats in my new Kamado Big Joe smoker. Thumbs up for the quality fit and finish with all the injector tips for all my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Popple

customer_reviews.title: I WOULD LIKE TO HAVE ONE
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE ALWAYS USED CHEAP INJECTORS. WHEN I OPENED THE PACKAGE, I KNEW I HAD A KEEPER. YOU CAN FEEL THE QUALITY JUST BY PICKING UP THE INJECTOR. IF YOU HAVE A CALENDER, I WOULD LIKE TO HAVE ONE. I AM ALREADY TELLING FELLOW Q'ERS ABOUT YOUR PRODUCT.KEEP UP THE GOOD WORK, YOU'RE ON THE RIGHT TRACK.
customer_reviews.author: raymond cool

customer_reviews.title: Leaked at plunger gasket.
customer_reviews.text: Had to return because plunger gasket was malformed and leaked. Recomend buyer's check injector components upon arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Ckent

customer_reviews.title: very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: used it for Thanksgiving, will last for years to come. Very high quality injector. Well worth the cost. Will be the first and last one I will ever need to purchase. It will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: KLL

customer_reviews.title: Great injector
customer_reviews.text: Although pricey it worked great, feels sturdy and works well with chunky marinades! 4 stars due to plunger, cap assembly is not stainless,if anything breaks it will be that assembly
customer_reviews.author: anthony h

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome!!! Makes marinating so easy and delicious !
customer_reviews.author: A customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally found a quality injector
customer_reviews.text: Great product. All metal, I think nickel plated brass which means it will last. I have destroyed 3 marinade injectors so far and this one is holding up great. Three injecting needles/nozzles of different sizes and configurations.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: A Grill Master's Must Have!!
customer_reviews.text: Works Great!! Very Versatile with the 3 different needles. Great Recipes with the free eBook!!

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. The BF is excited to start marinating for summer BBQs.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for Thanksgiving
customer_reviews.text: Got it in 2 days. Worked great for Thanksgiving, should last forever. I like the multiple needles for birds and roasts.

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: Used it for our pig roast. Nice to have different tips for different thickness of meat and different cuts of meat. Easy to clean and haven't experienced any leaking.

customer_reviews.title: thanxs for the great product.
customer_reviews.text: delivered on time with no damage.high quality and professional made injector that will be the last one i'll ever need.thanxs for the great product.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and clear instructions. Helped make the best smoked turkey I've ever eaten!

customer_reviews.title: BBQ Injector
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Injector Kit...really like the choice of three needles and the spare seals. This injector should meet all my BBQ needs. A quality product...

customer_reviews.text: I was amazed of the quality of this injector, this is the best one that i have ever seen.

customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I ordered this. Works better than expected. Will recommend to my family and friends.

customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Heavy duty. I bought a beast brand and all the needles were bent. Then I got this one. Perfect condition. Used it on 2 pork butts for the big game (Super Bowl)

customer_reviews.title: Good product, Well made
customer_reviews.text: Good product, Well made. I wish it was larger than 2 oz. This is designed for smaller cuts or whole poultry. Please design and make a larger unit available and I would buy it. 6oz..

customer_reviews.text: Works very well, though takes a little practice to fill it without spoiling.

customer_reviews.title: I think the idea of marinade injecting is great and it will take some trial and error to ...
customer_reviews.text: Product is OK, but I must say, I really think the unit I received was used - I purchased new. The packaging was sort of old and faded. Additionally the tips to the Injector only had protective plastic on one of the tips (the small one). I am not impressed with the efforts you must go to for access to the seller's website for the "eGuide". Once you get to the website it is sort of disappointing. I think the idea of marinade injecting is great and it will take some trial and error to get it right.
customer_reviews.author: No Bull

product_meta.title: Marinade Injector-Meat Injector Kit. 3 Needles for Great Tasting Food. Top Food Grade Stainless Steel. Gift Boxed Set and e-recipes download book
product_meta.description: Great food makes for great times with friends and family So you want to make food they love. Marinating adds flavor, moisture and tenderness, right? But its not the perfect solution because its not always convenient to be prepared ahead of time, which you need to be With conventional marinating. And even then it only works on the outer layer of the meat. Our ultimate marinade injector is the solution! You are going to love the appreciation you get from your friends and family when you cook for them using the lifestyle products ultimate marinade injector. They will be lining up for your amazing meals that have so much moisture and flavor, and the good times will roll! You're going to go beyond surface margination and create the best meals ever by marinating throughout the entire food. And if you haven't marinated in advance it still works A treat; you can cook up a delicious storm spontaneously. Its easy and fast to use; make yourself a rock-star chef any day of the week, don't save it just for special occasions! Typical marinade injectors are all or part plastic and break quickly. Our super Heavy Duty Stainless steel injector will last for many years; possibly the last one you ever need to buy. It comes in a stylish box with a neat tray that stores The injector between uses. It has three different Stainless steel needles for ultimate versatility; A 6 inch 12 hole for liquid marinades, a 6 inch large hole for marinades with small solids (minced garlic for example) and a small thin 2 hole needle for small cuts of meat. Bonuses: a comprehensive book with marinade recipes for poultry, beef, lamb, pork, fish and even venison plus use and care instructions A spare set of gaskets for the plunger and needles a neat storage tray register the product to double the 2 yr to 4 years
feature_bullets: THE ULTIMATE MARINADE INJECTOR; Includes a free bonus eBook download containing great food injector recipes for fabulous tasting meals by easily adding delicious marinade flavors. Become a cooking legend by creating ultra flavorsome and super moist grills, roasts and BBQs! Large 2 Oz. capacity for fast marinating. A must have turkey injector that will significantly reduce dryness, for moist, perfectly seasoned food

DELUXE PROFESSIONAL CHEF QUALITY; made from the highest grade food quality stainless steel to ensure 100% that your new meat marinator is completely food safe and ensures product durability. Constructed of heavy 304 Food Grade stainless steel for all food-facing components including, barrel, barrel nose, plunger and needles. This also includes a spare set of three O rings and a storage tray in the attractive gift box

MARINATE QUICKLY AND EASILY; complete with 3 specialized marinade injector needles which are designed for precision marinade injection into any cut meat size. Complete with small needle for marinating smaller cuts, a 6-inch needle with 12 holes for fast even distribution of liquid marinade into larger cuts and a 6-inch needle with a wide open end for injecting chunkier marinades such as minced garlic or herbs into larger cuts of meat.

PERFECT FOR ANY MEAT; this meat injector is perfect for keeping meat moist and tasty and improves the flavor of brisket, pork, chicken, turkey, lamb, goose, duck, and more! Durable and the needles inject any meat or poultry easily, enriching the taste and ensuring your meat is bursting with flavor. The ideal brine marinator or baster syringe
HIGH QUALITY: this injector is made to last and will perform and clean up nicely for years!
